channel.title: Code on JustinFX.com
channel.description: Recent content in Code on JustinFX.com

item.title: Write My Code For Me
item.description: Permalink – writemycode.net In the spirit of a very similar blog post, I decided to expand upon a specific area of that article… Consider a question like this: I want to do this. Create 10000 files, (filename can be just combination of time and random number). File size should be 4k. And I want to time this. say how many seconds it will take. How can I do this on bash?

item.title: Go language for python programmers
item.description:
Preface

I’ve been programming in python for over 5 years now, and I love the language a lot. I would look for any opportunity to accomplish my coding tasks using python, as opposed to learning new languages. PyQt4 for user interfaces, Django for web design, etc… And when python just isn’t an option, I have done my share of php, javascript, objective-c and so on.
